title: The Somnibus: The Complete Edition
description: This Complete Edition Contains Both Books I and II of The Somnibus.*The Somnibus is not paranormal romance but a chilling paranormal thriller.*Lost in a maze of death and betrayal, a young man with a rare paranormal power finds himself in a fight against a malevolent force hell-bent on revenge, the last man standing in a desperate battle to preserve the fate of mankind.
author: Craig McGray
